name: Project Compass Demo
description:
Woe betide men who no longer reach out
with the hands that they have been given.

Project Compass Demo is a plot- and character-driven adventure in the style of traditional turn-based Japanese role-playing games. Much care has gone into the storytelling and also into the combat and the hand-crafted boss battles with the aim of providing the player with an all-around engaging experience. The story of Project Compass will gradually unfold as the player progresses through the game.

The demo will take you through one chapter of Project Compass, and the main scenario will take a couple of hours to complete.  There's also a healthy amount of additional content in the demo including a few secrets and optional, challenging boss fights for those who want to invest more time in the demo.

Enjoy, and do give feedback if you feel like it! ;)

- Caerule

Additional info:
- The game runs on Windows computers.
- Parts of the game contain references to and depict the use of alcohol, and therefore the game may not be suitable for young children. Use your discretion here.
